DOC.brief_summary: The objective present study obtain information safety tolerability BIIF 1149 BS , determine pharmacologically active dose ( range ) perform citric acid challenge test obtain preliminary pharmacokinetic data
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Pharmacodynamics BIIF 1149 BS Healthy Young Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Participants healthy male Age range 21 50 year Within + 20 % normal weight ( BrocaIndex ) In accordance Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) local legislation volunteer suppose give write informed consent prior admission study Each subject medical history take receive complete medical examination ( incl . blood pressure pulse rate measurement ) well 12lead Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) A citric acid provocation test perform determine cumulative dose citric acid cause least three cough . If least three cough inhalation high citric acid concentration 32 % volunteer replace new person Haematopoietic , hepatic renal function test carry laboratory The subject fast 12 hour collection specimens laboratory evaluation . The mentioned examination perform within 14 day first administration test substance Volunteers exclude study result medical examination laboratory test judge clinical investigator differ significantly normal clinical value Volunteers know gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder Volunteers diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder History orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackouts Chronic relevant acute infection ( especially respiratory infection , cough ) History allergy/hypersensitivity ( include drug allergy ) deem relevant trial judge investigator Intake drug long halflife ( > = 24 hour ) within ten halflives respective drug enrolment study Use drug might influence result trial week previous start study Participation another study investigational drug within last two month precede study Smoker ( > 10 cigarette 3 cigar 3 pipes/day ) Inability refrain smoke study day Alcohol abuse ( > 40g/day ) Drug abuse Blood donation ( > = 100 ml ) within last 4 week Excessive physical activity ( e.g . competitive sport ) within last week study
